original_text: Moreover, King Cyrus brought out the articles belonging to the temple of the Lord, which Nebuchadnezzar had carried away from Jerusalem and had placed in the temple of his god.
korean_text: 고레스 왕이 또 여호와의 성전 그릇을 꺼내니 옛적에 느부갓네살이 예루살렘에서 옮겨다가 자기 신들의 신당에 두었던 것이라

sentences.original_text: Moreover, King Cyrus brought out the articles
belonging to the temple of the Lord
and had placed in the temple of his god
